reviewText: DVD and only 3/7 of them.  No book, flashcards, etc.  Total rip off.  Deceiving advertising.  Going back.

This was misleading. The advertisement picture says: book, flash cards, practise tests, disks. I only got the disks. And, while watching the teacher speak, you cannot see what the students attending do on the projector (they probably also have handouts too!). This is not worth $300!!! (unless I am missing a package).
